clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Two Doses of Hipnos in the Treatment of Adults With Insomnia
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized, Double-blind, Double-dummy, National, Phase II Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Two Doses of Hipnos Medication in the Treatment of Adults With Insomnia

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of three doses of Hipnos medication in adults with insomnia.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in sleep latency time, obtained through polysomnography, performed before and at the end of treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence and severity of adverse events recorded during the study.

arm_group.description: The study is double-dummy. Thus, the patient will take 2 tablets, as follow: 1 tablet Hipnos 3 and 1 placebo tablet, oral, once a day.
